vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀπερί-τμητος, ον,
uncircumcised, [LXX+1st c.AD+]
__II not clipped or circumscribed, φύσις[Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: uncircumcised (with a possible implication of being stubborn and obstinate)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
uncircumcised (with a possible implication of being stubborn and obstinate)
primarily uncircumcised; metaphorically uncircumcised in respect of untowardness and obduracy, Acts 7:51*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 未受割禮的
2) (喻意) 頑固不化的(心與耳未受割禮的) (徒7:51)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 未受割礼的
2) (喻意) 顽固不化的(心与耳未受割礼的) (徒7:51)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: chẳng cắt bì; không chịu cắt bì
